message.entry: Failed to add this control to the quick access bar because the control does not belong to any tab group.
Failed to remove this control from the quick access bar because the control does not belong to any tab group.
Failed to add this item to the Favorites category because the item does not belong to any popup.
Failed to add this item to the Favorites category because the Favorites category is disabled.
Failed to remove this item from the Favorites category because the item does not belong to any popup.
Failed to remove this item from the Favorites category because the Favorites category is disabled.
Failed to remove this item from the Favorites category because the item is not a favorite.
"SelectedIndex" property accepts an integer between 1 and the number of items.
"addItem" method accepts a character vector (value equals label) or a cell array of two character vectors (value and label).
"addItem" method accepts an integer between 1 and the number of items + 1.
"addItem" method accepts item and index.
"removeItem" method failed because the specified item is not found.
"removeItem" method failed because the specified index is out of bounds.
"removeItem" method accepts a character vector representing the value or an index.
"IconOverride" property accepts an Icon object.
"Icon" property accepts an Icon object.
"TextOverride" property accepts a character vector.
"DescriptionOverride" property accepts a character vector.
"Mnemonic" property accepts a character vector.
"Shortcut" property accepts a character vector.
"ShowButton" property accepts a logical value, true or false.
"UseSmallFont" property accepts a logical value, true or false.
"ShowDescription" property accepts a logical value, true or false.
"ShowIcon" property accepts a logical value, true or false.
"ShowText" property accepts a logical value, true or false.
"ClosePopupOnClick" property accepts a logical value, true or false.
"UseSingleLineDescription" property accepts a logical value, true or false.
Failed to share data and callback between controls because they are not compatible. Use "help" command to find more information.
"Enabled" property accepts a logical value, true or false.
"{0}" is an unrecognized action property.
"{0}" is an unrecognized action callback function.
"{0}" property accepts a character vector.
"{0}" property accepts a scalar finite real number.
"{0}" property accepts a positive finite integer.
"{0}" property accepts a logical value, true or false.
"{0}" property accepts a cell array of nx1 character vectors.
"Popup" property accepts a PopupList object.
"ButtonGroup" property accepts a ButtonGroup object.
The specified selected item cannot be found.
"Items" property accepts a cell array of nx1 character vectors or nx2 character vectors.
"Labels" property accepts a cell array of nx2 elements. The first column must be character vectors for labels and the second column must be integers for locations.
"SelectionMode" must be either 'single' or 'multiple'.
"NumberFormat" must be either 'integer' or 'double'.
"DecimalFormat" must be either precision in fixed-point notation such as '4f' or precision in scientific notation such as '5e'.
Gallery item "{0}" must have a valid icon.
The first input argument of the "DropDownGalleryButton" constructor must be a "GalleryPopup" object.
Cannot change "MaxColumnCount" after toolstrip is rendered. Set its value immediately after construction.
Cannot change "MinColumnCount" after toolstrip is rendered. Set its value immediately after construction.
Cannot change "MaxRows" after construction. Set its value by passing into the constructor.
Cannot change "MaxColumns" after construction. Set its value by passing into the constructor.
